channel.title: Compiler = JAVAC
channel.description:
Since i see many people are posting topics saying
HOW DO I GET MY A 6U2 COMPILER MY SATAN'S ISLE COMPILER DOSENT WORK
Or
MY COMPLIER DOSENT WORK HOW DO I GET MY PERFECT COMPILER TO WRK?!
This means you haven't learned the BASICS of java ANYWAY: You complier is located
C:\Program Files\Java\jdk***\bin\javac
If you did not install jdk to the location above then you will have to figure it out yourself If you really didn't know that then you shouldn't be learning java here! And to compile a file with javac just right click and use open with javac

item.title: Compiler = JAVAC
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“niggafree, post:7, topic:122872”]my compiler is fine becuz i fixed it i made it a very simple compiler no advanced options or shit just a compiler… i could send a pic of what a compiler looks like when it is doen? my compiler is this very simpile right click on your compile.bat
click edit
right click and select all

then delete

then add!!!

@echo off
title compiler
javac *.java
echo COMPILED
pause

but first watch that vid. i sent a link of … good vid on to making a server i have serverlal servers 2 made by scratch took me couple months but hey! its fucking awsome!!! all skill capes animated capes accutal skill cape looks!!! all items in it like rs advanced spirits and everything!!
i made 21 more spells too!!! fuck yea their awsome full mage full everything skill![/quote]
